en: Increases the player's HEALTH when activated, and increases the Arctic weapon's DAMAGE. If Helath is less than half during the wave, ADVERSITY is triggered.\n \n ADVERSITY: ....
<stat type=health value=25/> <stat type=damage value=10%/> ADVERSITY Lv1
<stat type=health value=50/> <stat type=damage value=15%/> ADVERSITY Lv2
Added <stat type=damage value=10%/> to Incandescent weapons
